description:
At Schneider Law, PLLC, we provide personalized service for our personal injury clients in New Paltz, New York. Our approach to helping injured parties seek compensation has helped us recover millions of dollars for our clients.

The Cases Handled By Our Law Office

Car crash cases are a big part of what we do, but they are by no means all we do. These are some of the many other cases the team at our law office may seek compensation for:

  • Serious injuries and medical malpractice
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Slip, trip and fall accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Nursing home negligence
  • Wrongful death

Why Choose Schneider Law, PLLC?

We are proud and fierce advocates for people who have suffered injuries because of another entity's negligence. Whether that entity is a drunk driver, a dog owner or a large corporation, we are ready to fight for you. Our attorney is committed to representing accident victims. In fact, we do not represent insurance companies or other corporations in personal injury cases.

To ensure that the people who need our services can access them, we do not charge a consultation fee. We also do not charge a fee to visit clients at home or in the hospital. In fact, our clients never pay anything out of pocket for our services. Our law office collects fees only if we win.
